group_1.textRight: Sorry I'm late!

group_1.textLeft: Today was the day of the diabolo class, correct?

group_1.textRight: Sure was!
It was way harder than last time since we had@more participants, see,
but me and the staff did our best to coach 'em.
The only reason I'm doin' this well is 'cause@of my manager.
I talked to him about coachin' diabolo classes,
and he agreed to be the point of contact and@make arrangements.

group_1.textLeft: So I take it you will continue coaching for some@time yet?

group_1.textRight: That's the plan.
Since I'm not doin' street performances or@other entertainment things,
I wanna make some money for my family…
Y'know, teachin' someone else helps me@realize things, too.
When we work towards a goal together and@achieve it,
it makes me even happier than when I pull off@a big move!

group_1.textLeft: Helping children improve and being happy@for their achievements…
Before I knew it, you've become such an adult,@Urara♪

group_1.textRight: When the heck did that happen?!

group_1.textLeft: But you truly have grown.@Much more than before.

group_1.textRight: I'm so happy to hear you say that, Rabi.@[chara:103601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:103601:mouthOpen_1][chara:103601:lipSynch_1]Nipah!
(…After I became a Magical Girl,)
(I had to break up with Kurara and retire@from bein' a street performer.)
(I was planning to give up on everything if@we're all doomed to our fates anyway, but…)
…Look, I wanna continue coaching even after@I'm an adult.
I wanna increase the number of kids who have@fun playin' with the diabolo.

group_1.textLeft: Speaking of which, the reason you took up@performing with the diabolo...
Was to entertain your younger siblings, right?

group_1.textRight: That's right.

group_1.textLeft: The two of us are gonna be the best duo@in the whole wide world.
We'll make people all over the globe smile@with our diabolo act!

group_1.textRight: (I'd given up on that since I figured I couldn't do@it anymore, now that I'm a Magical Girl, but…)
I wanna take my goal of makin' people smile@with diabolo acts.
And pass it down to the younger generation@by coachin' them.

group_1.textLeft: That dream feels just like you, Urara.

group_1.textRight: Me too…@I'll do my best!
(As a Magical Girl, I know I can't live@a normal life…)
(But even so, can I at least have a dream@like this…?)

group_1.textCenter: I'm gonna make this dream come true@one day!
